backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining membership, user profiles, deals, buyers, contracts, analytics, and Stripe config, including storage mixins and authorization setup.
backend/migration.mo: Simple migration module that preserves existing actor state by returning the old actor unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature evidence for recent frontend authentication, diagnostics, and profile-loading reliability changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all significant frontend files describing functionality, styling, and improved auth and diagnostics behavior.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and styling for light/dark modes and sidebar color system.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app with root div and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating startup flow, identity, actor initialization, profile fetching, error handling, and route-specific startup behavior.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Display component showing an access-denied message with optional back navigation.
frontend/src/components/AnalysisResultCa: UI card that renders deal analysis details, including ARV, MAO, comps, and rating badge.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main application shell managing navigation, user logout, and lazy-loaded page rendering, with mobile support and an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AppShellErrorBou: Error boundary component that catches render errors in AppShell and displays a fallback UI with reset capability.
frontend/src/components/BuyerCard.tsx: Displays a buyer’s summary info including contact details, budget, and preferred areas, with an edit trigger.
frontend/src/components/BuyerEditorDialo: Dialog for creating, editing, and deleting buyers with form fields and validation tied to query mutations.
frontend/src/components/ContractList.tsx: Fetches and displays contracts for a deal with status, download support, and error or empty states.
frontend/src/components/ContractUploader: Uploader for contract files with type/size validation, progress tracking, and mutation to store the document.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Card showing key deal details like address, ARV, offer, and profit, with an edit button.
frontend/src/components/DealEditorDialog: Dialog for creating, editing, and deleting deals with full form state, validation, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/FeatureLock.tsx: Displays a locked-feature card prompting users to upgrade to required membership tiers.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyPerforman: Builds a 6‑month bar chart summarizing closed profit and estimated fees from deal data.
frontend/src/components/OpaqueOverlays.t: Provides opaque wrapper components for dialog, sheet, and select content to override default translucent styles.
frontend/src/components/PageQueryErrorSt: Shows a standardized error state with retry, secondary actions, and optional contact support.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Onboards new users by initializing their profile and saving basic contact info with error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfitByZipTable: Renders a simple table listing zip codes with their total profit.
frontend/src/components/SignInScreen.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with branding, sign‑in button, and value propositions.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Error screen component displaying startup failures with diagnostic hints, technical details, and actions to retry or sign out.
frontend/src/components/StartupLoadingSc: Loading screen showing app branding and a spinner with an optional message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Hook that builds a backend actor with identity and optional admin token handling, exposing readiness and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identities, status flags, and the AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Hooks for tracking media query matches, including a helper for detecting mobile screens.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react‑query hooks for backend data, including profile fetching with timeout, error normalization, and identity-safe caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind theme definitions for light and dark modes plus base styling and sidebar component tweaks.
frontend/src/lib/authErrors.ts: Provides helpers to detect auth, timeout, and network errors and map them to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/lib/copy.ts: Defines static UI copy strings for navigation, errors, empty states, locked features, admin text, and support.
frontend/src/lib/dealMath.ts: Contains simple real estate math utilities for MAO, estimated profit, and assignment fees.
frontend/src/lib/membership.ts: Implements membership tier access checks and feature lock messaging.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Formats and parses USD values to and from bigint cents.
frontend/src/lib/support.ts: Holds support email utilities for generating and opening mailto links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin interface for managing membership pricing, granting tiers, and configuring Stripe.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Displays analytics metrics and profit-by-zip data with membership gating and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/BuyersListPage.tsx: Shows and manages the user's buyers list with create/edit dialogs and membership checks.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Manages contract uploads and listings for selected deals with Enterprise-tier gating and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays deal metrics, charts, and user membership info, loading deals and user profile and handling errors.
frontend/src/pages/DealAnalyzerPage.tsx: Provides AI-driven deal analysis input, displays analysis results, and allows creating a new deal from the analysis.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPipelinePage.tsx: Shows the deals pipeline grouped by stage, enforces membership limits, and provides deal creation and editing.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Loads membership catalog, displays tier options, and initiates Stripe checkout for upgrades.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment cancellation notice with session ID and options to retry or return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Confirms membership purchase using the Stripe session, updates user profile, and handles success or error states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, managing sessionStorage-backed persistence, and extracting the current route path.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, theming extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, known issues, and feature requests related to profile-loading reliability and frontend auth error handling.
